verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:1
verses.text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry, as we have received mercy, we faint not;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:2
verses.text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty, not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man’s conscience in the sight of God.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:3
verses.text: But if our gospel be hid, it is hid to them that are lost:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:4
verses.text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.
